content.html: Fun one with mutation tests: one mutant caused a side-effect to trigger within a unit test suite, resulting in a `git push` happening. Luckily, that didn't do anything, because it only prompted me to unlock my YubiKey with a pin, rather than destroying upstream :D
content.value:
Fun one with mutation tests: one mutant caused a side-effect to trigger within a unit test suite, resulting in a `git push` happening.

Luckily, that didn't do anything, because it only prompted me to unlock my YubiKey with a pin, rather than destroying upstream :D
